name: HRexTempCodes
title: HRex Temporary Code System
description: Codes temporarily defined as part of the HRex implementation guide.  These will eventually migrate into an officially maintained terminology (likely HL7's UTG code systems).

concept.definition: A type of Task asking the owner to deliver the data corresponding to the characteristics defined by the Task.inputs to the Task.beneficiary
Indicates the parameters of a FHIR RESTful search to be executed whose results are requested.  The content will be the query URL following the 'base'.  E.g. `Observation?...`
A code for a document or otherwise describing the characteristics of the information requested
The result of a data request
